title: Epilepsy Education Package
description: Parents can actively record information on the mobile application related to their child’s diagnosis; test results; treatments; timing and frequency of the seizures; and appointments; and schedule treatment and examination reminders to optimize compliance. In addition, there is a message section allowing parents to send messages to the researcher team at any time.  Compliance with the treatment will be evaluated through the information that parents upload to the epilepsy education package (taking the drugs on time).

summary: Developed For The Parents/Caregivers of Children With Epilepsy
